entry.title: A new design for THNK
entry.summary: THNK got a relooking, brought by LeoRed ðŸ˜Ž
entry.content:
THNK just got a relooking! ðŸ˜Ž

Leo Red designed a new set of icons and banners for THNK. The website has been updated to use them, and the extensions' icons will soon be updated as well. Shoutout to Leo, buy him a coffee if you like his designs:

entry.title: The THNK website has been released!
entry.summary: I am happy to announce the opening of the THNK website!
entry.content:
THNK now has a website!

It is built upon Docusaurus 2.0, and will be home to the documentation and the blog/devlog of THNK. You can submit modifications to it via GitHub, and are welcome to help. I hope to achieve to build together a quality resource for understanding THNK.

That's it for now, there is not much to say yet. See you later for more ðŸ˜‰!
